description: Part single, part 2 storey front extension, extension to roof at side to form gable end with rear dormer and pitched roof to front porch.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of the decision notice. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Location Plan281¬_PL_000 281¬_PL_001281¬_PL_105A Rev A281¬_PL_150281¬_PL_100281¬_PL_152A Rev A281¬_PL_115281¬_PL_131281¬_PL_002281¬_PL_151281¬_PL_205A Rev A281¬_PL_350281¬_PL_200281¬_PL_210A Rev A281¬_PL_352A Rev A281¬_PL_900A Rev A281¬_PL_902A Rev A281¬_PL_901A rev A281¬_PL_215A Rev A281¬_PL_351A Rev A281¬_PL_331A Rev A Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

All new external work shall be carried out in materials that match the existing or as specified in the approved application.Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.
